title: Understanding Sorting
text: To sort a table in ascending order, you need to arrange the data from the smallest to the largest value.

title: Locating the Sort Option
text: The sorting options are usually found under the 'Sort & Filter' menu in the 'Home' or 'Editing' section of most spreadsheet applications.

hintAnswer: Sort & Filter (home|editing), click Sort A to Z
title: Choosing the Correct Sort Option
text: Which option should you select to sort the data in ascending order?
choices: editing), click Sort A to Z
